text: Baldassarre Orero (June 1, 1841 – November 11, 1914) was an Italian general. He was the first Italian colonial governor of Eritrea. ==Awards== *Military Order of Savoy *Maurician medal *Commemorative Medal of the Unity of Italy ==References== * F. Bandini, Gli italiani in Africa: Storia delle guerre coloniali. (1882-1943), Longanesi, 1971 Category:1841 births Category:1914 deaths Category:Italian generals
title: Baldassarre Orero
